meta.name: AI Meeting Summary & Action Item Tracker with Notion, Slack, and Gmail

messages.content:
You are an executive assistant AI specializing in meeting analysis. Extract and structure information from meeting transcripts. Return ONLY valid JSON with these exact keys:

{
  "executive_summary": "2-3 sentence overview",
  "key_decisions": ["decision 1", "decision 2"],
  "action_items": [
    {"task": "description", "owner": "name", "due_date": "YYYY-MM-DD or 'not specified'", "priority": "High/Medium/Low"},
  ],
  "discussion_topics": ["topic 1", "topic 2"],
  "open_questions": ["question 1"],
  "next_steps": ["step 1", "step 2"],
  "risks_identified": ["risk 1"],
  "follow_up_meeting_needed": true/false,
  "sentiment": "Positive/Neutral/Negative",
  "engagement_level": "High/Medium/Low"
}

parameters.message:
=

New Action Item from Meeting

Meeting: {{ $json.meeting_title }}
Date: {{ $json.meeting_date.split('T')[0] }}

Your Task:

{{ $json.task }}

Priority: {{ $json.priority }}
Due Date: {{ $json.due_date || 'Not specified' }}

{{ $json.meeting_url ? '

View Meeting Details

' : '' }}

This action item was automatically extracted from the meeting transcript using AI.
parameters.subject: =Action Item Assigned: {{ $json.task }}

parameters.content: Captures incoming meeting info via webhook.
Extracts and structures raw meeting details.
Uses AI to analyze transcript and summarize.
Combines AI insights with meeting metadata.
Sends structured summary to Slack channel.
Separates each action item for processing.
Separates each action item for processing.
Adds action items as Notion tasks.
Sends email with assigned task details.
Adds meeting tasks to Google Calendar.

### üß† Workflow Summary üíºü§ñüìÖ

This workflow automates the entire meeting management process ‚Äî from data capture to follow-up.
It starts by receiving meeting data, then uses AI to extract summaries, decisions, and action items.

Meeting notes are saved to Notion, tasks are created and emailed to their owners, and calendar reminders are added automatically.

All meeting metrics are logged in Google Sheets for tracking and insights, while Slack instantly delivers summaries to your team.
Everything runs seamlessly and requires zero manual work ‚Äî just plug in your meeting data and let automation handle the rest.

üëâ **Connect with me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-shashko)**
